name: Dr Car Parking Mania – Training Loop Drive with Auto Crash Sirens and Lights
name_original: Dr Car Parking Mania – Training Loop Drive with Auto Crash Sirens and Lights
description:
Play the ultimate car parking test. Drive through the loop mania in city and rush to the spot.
Crazy about parking games!!! Hop in the ford mustang and park your car before time runs out.

With ‘easy to learn, hard to master’ driver gameplay. Dive into the highlighted space and clear levels with flash sports car. Upgrade your mustang to jeep and pick up or a cumbersome big-rig. Complete the speed driving school challenge and earn the ultimate Dr Driving title.

Burn up the sud street with the fastest driving simulator. In this nail biting parking mania, do not hit the obstacles. Enjoy the real park zone simulation in Dr. Car Parking Mania 2016
